pred: 3 friends are going to a village party. Lia is tired after hiking. Mico wants to go because there may be hot boys. Jim doesn't like the idea of a real village boy. Lia doesn't like the idea of a village party. Mico wants to go there, but Jeff doesn't. Mico wants to drive. Jeff doesn't like the idea of drinking. Mico thanks Jeff.
answers: Mico and Jeff will go to the village party. Jeff will drive.
